txt.en: Nendath can be found just south-east of Tadrent, along the foothills of the Emyn Ernil.\n\nYou should hike up to Nendath and scout the valley for Corsair movements.
Find a good spot on Nendath to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> at the Corsair camp Makham Mijann.
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> at Makham Mijann for signs of trouble
The camp is oddly quiet; however, you see Corsairs near the camp moving crates downstream
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> at Makham Mijann for signs of trouble

'Corsairs at the beacon!? The situation is worse than I thought. They must know of our every movement!\n\n'And what's this you say? Corsairs are sending crates downstream? I wonder where they are sending them! It can not be for any good purpose, that is certain.'
This is a good place to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> at the Corsair camp Makham Mijann
Corsairs are occupying the beacon, monitoring Tadrent for activity
The situation at Tadrent is dire. Scouting the valley from atop the beacon at Nendath may help plan your attack on the Corsair encampment.

'[placeholder], would you hike up to the beacon of Nendath and scout the surrounding area? From Nendath, you should be able to spot anyone moving about the valley.\n\n'Tread carefully, [placeholder]. I do not believe the Corsairs have crossed the river recently, but one can only guess at their movements under cover of darkness.'
Climb the foothills to the beacon at Nendath
Bruidis can be found back in Tadrent.\n\nTalk to Bruidis and tell her what you have seen. She will help you form a plan of action against the Corsairs at Makham Mijann.
